news.title: Chris Mason: Migrant deal will be seen as failure if numbers don't fall
news.summary: The "one-in-one-out" deal with France to be announced later will have to deter people from getting in small boats.

news.title: Four arrested in connection with M&S and Co-op cyber-attacks
news.summary: Three men and one woman - aged between 17 and 20 - have been arrested in London and the Midlands.

news.title: UK faces rising and unpredictable threat from Iran, report warns
news.summary: A wide-ranging report by an intelligence committee has set out the risks Iran poses to the UK.

news.title: Children queuing for supplements killed in Israeli strike in Gaza, hospital says
news.summary: Eight children were among 15 people reportedly killed when a queue for nutritional supplements was hit in Deir al-Balah.

news.title: Olympian Caster Semenya denied a fair hearing over sex eligibility rules, court says
news.summary: Double Olympic champion Caster Semenya wins a partial victory at the European Court of Human Rights in her long legal battle over athletics' sex eligibility rules.

news.title: Deadly new Russian drone and missile attack hits Kyiv
news.summary: At least two people were killed and 16 injured, with fires burning across Ukraine's capital, officials said.

news.title: 'Huggable' piece of Sycamore Gap tree to go on permanent display
news.summary: A piece of the Sycamore Gap tree trunk is unveiled at its new home near Hadrian's Wall.

news.title: Ban some foreigners from sickness benefits, Tories urge
news.summary: Leader Kemi Badenoch will set out her plans to restrict welfare payments in a speech on Thursday.

news.title: Heatwave to peak this weekend as temperatures soar to 34C
news.summary: Parts of the UK are already experiencing heatwave conditions, which could continue into early next week.

news.title: How a wanted man evaded police and went on to kill dog walker Anita Rose
news.summary: A man has been convicted of committing murder while he was on Suffolk Police's most-wanted criminals list.
